##### FILE: 9-tethys-harbor.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to tethys/Deployment/ers-ce:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: ers-ce
  name: ers-ce
  namespace: tethys
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ers-ce
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ers-ce
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: K8S_HOST_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: K8S_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: ALLOWED_HOSTS
          value: '"[localhost, 127.0.0.1, 10.208.1.40]"'
        - name: CLIENT_MAX_BODY_SIZE
          value: 75M
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: TETHYS_DB_HOST
          value: tethys-pg
        - name: TETHYS_DB_NAME
          value: tethys_platform
        - name: TETHYS_DB_USERNAME
          value: tethys_default
        - name: TETHYS_DB_PASSWORD
          value: pass
        - name: TETHYS_DB_SUPERUSER
          value: tethys_super
        - name: TETHYS_DB_SUPERUSER_PASS
          value: pass
        - name: TETHYS_PORT
          value: "8000"
        - name: TERM
          value: xterm
        - name: APACHE_SSL_CERT_FILE
          value: /var/lib/tethys_persist/keys/${APACHE_SSL_CERT_FILE-server.crt}
        - name: APACHE_SSL_KEY_FILE
          value: /var/lib/tethys_persist/keys/${APACHE_SSL_KEY_FILE-server.key}
        - name: NUM_PROCESSES
          value: ${NUM_PROCESSES-20}
        - name: LOGIN_PAGE_TEMPLATE
          value: /helios/login.html
        - name: PROXY_SERVER_ADDITIONAL_DIRECTIVES
          value: |
            --additional-directive 'Header always set Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload"' --additional-directive "SSLProtocol -ALL +TLSv1.2" --additional-directive 'SSLCipherSuite ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384' --additional-directive 'ProxyTimeout 300' --additional-directive 'RewriteEngine on' --additional-directive 'RewriteCond %!{(MISSING)HTTP_HOST} ${ALLOWED_HOSTS_APACHE-!^(127\.0\.0\.1|localhost)$} [NC]' --additional-directive 'RewriteRule ^(.*)$ - [L,R=400]'
        - name: BYPASS_TETHYS_HOME_PAGE
          value: "true"
        - name: DJANGO_ALLOW_ASYNC_UNSAFE
          value: "true"
        - name: TETHYS_DB_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: USE_SSL
          value: "true"
        - name: STATICFILES_USE_NPM
          value: "true"
        - name: OTHER_SETTINGS
          value: |
            -s INSTALLED_APPS "['uit_plus_job', 'oidc_auth']" -s AUTHENTICATION_BACKENDS "['uit_plus_job.oauth2.UitPlusOAuth2', 'oidc_auth.oidc_auth.OIDCConnectAuth']" -s OAUTH_CONFIG.SOCIAL_AUTH_UITPLUS_KEY ${UITPLUS_KEY} -s OAUTH_CONFIG.SOCIAL_AUTH_UITPLUS_SECRET ${UITPLUS_SECRET} -s OAUTH_CONFIG.SOCIAL_AUTH_OIDC_KEY ${OIDC_KEY} -s OAUTH_CONFIG.SOCIAL_AUTH_OIDC_SECRET ${OIDC_SECRET} -s SOCIAL_AUTH_PIPELINE "['social_core.pipeline.social_auth.social_details', 'social_core.pipeline.social_auth.social_uid', 'social_core.pipeline.social_auth.auth_allowed', 'social_core.pipeline.social_auth.social_user', 'social_core.pipeline.user.get_username', 'social_core.pipeline.social_auth.associate_by_email', 'social_core.pipeline.user.create_user', 'social_core.pipeline.social_auth.associate_user', 'social_core.pipeline.social_auth.load_extra_data', 'social_core.pipeline.user.user_details']" -s BOKEH_RESOURCES inline -s CSRF_COOKIE_HTTPONLY "false" -s SESSION_CONFIG.SESSION_SECURITY_EXPIRE_AFTER 900 -s SESSION_CONFIG.SESSION_SECURITY_WARN_AFTER 600 -s SOCIAL_AUTH_REDIRECT_IS_HTTPS "true" -s LOGGING.loggers.uit.level "${UIT_LOGGING_LEVEL-DEBUG}"
        image: harbor.erdc.dren.mil/rad/ers-ce:dev
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ers-ce
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https

---

##### FILE: access-hdfs-install.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/access-hdfs:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: access-hdfs
  name: access-hdfs
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - -c
    - bash /kubedoop/test/hdfs-access-assert.sh
    command:
    - /bin/bash
    env:
    - name: KRB5_CONFIG
      value: /kubedoop/kerberos/krb5.conf
    - name: HADOOP_CONF_DIR
      value: /kubedoop/config/hdfs
    - name: HADOOP_OPTS
      value: -Djava.security.krb5.conf=/kubedoop/kerberos/krb5.conf
    image: quay.io/zncdatadev/hadoop:3.3.6-kubedoop0.0.0-dev
    name: access-hdfs
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      runAsUser: 0
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /kubedoop/test
      name: krb5-hdfs-access
    - mountPath: /kubedoop/config/hdfs
      name: hdfs-config
    - mountPath: /kubedoop/kerberos
      name: krb5
    - mountPath: /kubedoop/kerberos-admin
      name: krb5-admin
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      name: krb5-hdfs-access
    name: krb5-hdfs-access
  - ephemeral:
      volumeClaimTemplate:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            secrets.kubedoop.dev/class: kerberos
            secrets.kubedoop.dev/kerberosServiceNames: alice,BOB
            secrets.kubedoop.dev/scope: service=hdfscluster-sample
        spec:
          accessModes:
          - ReadWriteOnce
          resources:
            requests:
              storage: 10Mi
          storageClassName: secrets.kubedoop.dev
          volumeMode: Filesystem
    name: krb5
  - ephemeral:
      volumeClaimTemplate:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            secrets.kubedoop.dev/class: kerberos
            secrets.kubedoop.dev/kerberosServiceNames: nn
            secrets.kubedoop.dev/scope: service=hdfscluster-sample
        spec:
          accessModes:
          - ReadWriteOnce
          resources:
            requests:
              storage: 10Mi
          storageClassName: secrets.kubedoop.dev
          volumeMode: Filesystem
    name: krb5-admin
  - configMap:
      name: hdfscluster-sample
    name: hdfs-config

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: shared-resources
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:

##### FILE: AccessingResourcesFromOtherNamespaces_6.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backend/Pod/nginx-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: nginx-pod
  namespace: backend
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-data
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - kubectl get configmap example-configmap -n shared-resources -o jsonpath='{.data.index\.html}'
      > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
    image: bitnami/kubectl
    name: fetch-config
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-data
  serviceAccountName: example-service-account
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: shared-data

---

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: backend
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

  - image: nginx

    - sh
    - -c
    - kubectl get configmap example-configmap -n shared-resources -o jsonpath='{.data.index\.html}'
      > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
    image: bitnami/kubectl
    name: fetch-config
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html

  serviceAccountName: example-service-account
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: shared-data

##### FILE: access-manual-listener_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/access-manual-listener:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: access-manual-listener
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: access-manual-listener
  serviceName: default
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: access-manual-listener
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          echo "start caddy"
          caddy file-server --access-log --root /usr/share/caddy --listen :8080
        image: caddy:2
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: caddy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          while true; do
            if [ -d "/opt/listener/default-address" ]; then
              break
            fi
            echo "waiting for listener address to be created"
            sleep 2
          done
          ADDRESS=$(cat /opt/listener/default-address/address)
          PORT=$(cat /opt/listener/default-address/ports/http)
          echo "default listener address: $ADDRESS:$PORT"

          # use curl to access the listener with 5 times retry and 2 seconds interval
          for i in {1..5}; do
            if curl -s $ADDRESS:$PORT > /dev/null; then
              sleep infinity
            fi
            echo "failed to access the listener, retrying in 2 seconds..."
            sleep 2
          done
          echo "failed to access the listener 5 times, exiting..."
          exit 1
        image: registry.access.redhat.com/ubi9-minimal:latest
        name: access-manual-listener
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/listener
          name: manual-listener
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      annotations:
        listeners.kubedoop.dev/listenerName: manual-listener
      name: manual-listener
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Mi
      storageClassName: listeners.kubedoop.dev

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: account_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Role/jenkins:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: Role
metadata:
  name: jenkins
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - pods
  - services
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - apps
  resources:
  - deployments
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch

  - ""
  resources:
  - pods/exec
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch

  - ""

  - pods/log

  - get
  - list
  - watch

  - ""
  resources:
  - secrets
  verbs:
  - get

  - create
  - delete

  - update

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/logging:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: logging
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/logging:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: logging
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/logging:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: logging
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/logging:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: logging
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

  - delete

##### FILE: accountservice.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/accountservice:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: accountservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: accountservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: accountservice
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.0.xx
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MANAGER_HOSTANDPORT
          value: manager:80
        - name: PROXY_PREFIX
          value: accountservice
        - name: DT_RELEASE_VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['app.kubernetes.io/version']
        - name: DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['app']
        - name: DT_RELEASE_STAGE
          value: Labxx
        - name: DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION
          value: 09-02-2024
        image: europe-docker.pkg.dev/dynatrace-demoability/docker/easytrade/accountservice:d863a2e
        name: accountservice
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 100Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ersms-forum/Deployment/accounts-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: accounts-service
  name: accounts-service
  namespace: ersms-forum
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: accounts-service
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: accounts-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: kubernetes
        - name: AXON_AXONSERVER_SERVERS
          value: axonserver
        - name: AXONIQ_CONSOLE_CREDENTIALS
          value: 68447ea9-1:4ac1289d784047ac88cc1e1ab39bdefc
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_URI
          value: mongodb://root:root@mongodb:27017/accounts?authSource=admin
        - name: KC_BASE
          value: https://keycloak:8888
        - name: KC_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: KC_ADMINPASSWORD
              name: kc-admin-pass
        - name: SPRING_SECURITY_OAUTH2_RESOURCESERVER_JWT_ISSUERURI
          value: https://keycloak:8888/keycloak/realms/ersms
        - name: SPRING_SECURITY_OAUTH2_RESOURCESERVER_JWT_JWKSETURI
          value: https://keycloak:8888/keycloak/realms/ersms/protocol/openid-connect/certs
        image: ghcr.io/ersms-24l/ersms-24l/accounts:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - sh
              - -c
              - sleep 10
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /accounts/actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8081
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 240
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: accounts-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /accounts/actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8081
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 250Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

  - activechecks
  verbs:
  - '*'

##### FILE: adapter.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/fluentd-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  fluentd.conf: |
    <source>
      type tail
      format none
      path /var/log/1.log
      pos_file /var/log/1.log.pos
      tag PHP
    </source>
    <source>
      type tail
      format none
      path /var/log/2.log
      pos_file /var/log/2.log.pos
      tag JAVA
    </source>
    <match **>
       @type file
       path /var/log/fluent/access
    </match>
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: fluentd-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: adapter_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/counter:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: counter
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      i=0; while true; do
        echo "$i: $(date)" >> /var/log/1.log;
        echo "$(date) INFO $i" >> /var/log/2.log;
        i=$((i+1));
        sleep 1;
      done
    image: busybox
    name: count
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/log
      name: varlog
  - env:
    - name: FLUENTD_ARGS
      value: -c /etc/fluentd-config/fluentd.conf
    image: k8s.gcr.io/fluentd-gcp:1.30
    name: count-agent
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/log
      name: varlog
    - mountPath: /etc/fluentd-config
      name: config-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: varlog
  - configMap:
      name: fluentd-config
    name: config-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/fluentd-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  fluentd.conf: |
    <source>
      type tail
      format none
      path /var/log/1.log
      pos_file /var/log/1.log.pos
      tag PHP
    </source>
    <source>
      type tail
      format none
      path /var/log/2.log
      pos_file /var/log/2.log.pos
      tag JAVA
    </source>
    <match **>
       @type file
       path /var/log/fluent/access
    </match>
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: fluentd-config
  namespace: default

##### FILE: adapter1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/counter:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: counter
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      i=0; while true; do
        echo "$i: $(date)" >> /var/log/1.log;
        echo "$(date) INFO $i" >> /var/log/2.log;
        i=$((i+1));
        sleep 1;
      done
    image: busybox
    name: count
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/log
      name: varlog
  - env:
    - name: FLUENTD_ARGS
      value: -c /etc/fluentd-config/fluentd.conf
    image: k8s.gcr.io/fluentd-gcp:1.30
    name: count-agent
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/log
      name: varlog
    - mountPath: /etc/fluentd-config
      name: config-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: varlog
  - configMap:
      name: fluentd-config
    name: config-volume

---

##### FILE: adapter2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/webserver-1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webserver
  name: webserver-1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: webserver
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
      name: nginx-conf
      readOnly: true
  - args:
    - -nginx.scrape-uri
    - http://localhost/nginx_status
    image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.4.2
    name: adapter
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9113
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      items:
      - key: default.conf
        path: default.conf
      name: nginx-conf
    name: nginx-conf

---

##### FILE: adapter-configmap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  default.conf: |
    server {                          # Define an Nginx server block.
      listen       80;                # Listen on port 80.
      server_name  localhost;         # Set the server name to 'localhost'.
      location / {                    # Define a location block for the root path.
          root   /usr/share/nginx/html;  # Serve content from this directory.
          index  index.html index.htm;   # Specify default index files.
      }
      error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;  # Define error pages for specific codes.
      location = /50x.html {
          root   /usr/share/nginx/html;         # Specify the location of the error page.
      }
      location /nginx_status {                  # Define a location block for '/nginx_status'.
        stub_status;                            # Enable Nginx status module.
        allow 127.0.0.1;                        # Allow requests only from localhost.
        deny all;                               # Deny all other hosts.
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: additional-scrape-configs1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Secret/additional-scrape-configs:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: additional-scrape-configs
  namespace: monitoring
stringData:
  prometheus-additional.yaml: |
    - job_name: ec2-node-exporter
      ec2_sd_configs:
      - region: us-east-1
        port: 9100
        filters:
        - name: tag:eks:cluster-name
          values:
          - demo-amd64
      relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [__meta_ec2_tag_Name]
        target_label: instance
      - regex: "__meta_ec2_tag_(.+)"
        action: labelmap

---

##### FILE: additionalScrapeConfigs1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Secret/kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus-scrape-confg:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus-scrape-confg
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: kube-prometheus-stack
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus-stack
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 47.1.0
    chart: kube-prometheus-stack-47.1.0
    heritage: Helm
    release: kube-prometheus-stack
  name: kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus-scrape-confg
  namespace: monitoring
stringData:
  additional-scrape-configs.yaml: |-
    - "job_name": "windows-exporter"
      "relabel_configs":
      - "action": "replace"
        "regex": "(.*)"
        "replacement": "$1"
        "source_labels":
        - "__meta_kubernetes_endpoint_address_target_name"
        "target_label": "instance"
      "static_configs":
      - "targets":
        - "172.19.1.1:9100"
        - "172.19.1.101:9100"
    - "job_name": "nvidia-exporter"
      "relabel_configs":
      - "action": "replace"
        "regex": "(.*)"
        "replacement": "$1"
        "source_labels":
        - "__meta_kubernetes_endpoint_address_target_name"
        "target_label": "instance"
      "static_configs":
      - "targets":
        - "dcgm-exporter.gpu-node.svc.cluster.local:9400"

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: address_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dev-kube/Deployment/address:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: address
  namespace: dev-kube
spec:
  replicas: ${POD}
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: address
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: address
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: docker
        image: address:${IMAGE_TAG}
        name: address
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 600m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app-label: address-app
  name: address-app
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: address-app
  template:

      labels:
        app-label: address-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: address-db-secrets
        image: ssamantr/address-service:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: address-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: address-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8081
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 2000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 35
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8081
          periodSeconds: 2

          name: http-initial

          name: http
          protocol: TCP

          name: adguard-data
        - mountPath: /opt/adguardhome/conf/AdGuardHome.yaml
          name: adguard-config
          subPath: AdGuardHome.yaml
      volumes:
      - name: adguard-data

          claimName: adguard-pvc

        name: adguard-config

kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: lets-encrypt
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTPS
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
  name: adguard-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: public
  rules:
  - host: adguard.kube.modalsemangat.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: adguard-home
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - adguard.kube.modalsemangat.com
    secretName: adguard-ingress-tls

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: adguard
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

##### FILE: admin.deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/portfolio-admin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: portfolio-admin
  name: portfolio-admin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: portfolio-admin
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: portfolio-admin
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: portfolio-admin-conf
        - secretRef:
            name: portfolio-admin-secret
        image: portfolio-admin
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 4400
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4400
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 4400
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 20

---

##### FILE: admin2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/admin-backend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: admin-backend
  name: admin-backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: admin-backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: admin-backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - npm
        - run
        - start:dev
        env:
        - name: BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
              name: kafka-secrets
        - name: DB_DATABASE
          value: admin
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: 35.200.133.227
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: GROUP_ID
          value: admin_consumer
        - name: SASL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SASL_PASSWORD
              name: kafka-secrets
        - name: SASL_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SASL_USERNAME
              name: kafka-secrets
        - name: USERS_MS
          value: http://users-backend:8001
        image: afsalkp/admin:0.0.2
        name: admin-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:

    io.kompose.service: admin-consumer
  name: admin-consumer
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: admin-consumer

    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: admin-consumer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - npm
        - run
        - consume
        env:
        - name: BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
              name: kafka-secrets
        - name: DB_DATABASE
          value: admin
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: 35.200.133.227
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: GROUP_ID
          value: admin_consumer
        - name: SASL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SASL_PASSWORD
              name: kafka-secrets
        - name: SASL_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SASL_USERNAME
              name: kafka-secrets
        - name: USERS_MS
          value: http://users-ms:3000
        image: afsalkp/admin:0.0.2
        name: admin-consumer

            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

            memory: 128Mi

    app: adminapi
  name: adminapi-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 3000
    protocol: TCP
  selector:
    app: adminapi
  type: LoadBalancer

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/adminapi-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: adminapi
  name: adminapi-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: adminapi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: adminapi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: DB_DBPORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          value: password123
        - name: DB_DATABASE
          value: scrum_hub
        - name: RMQ_URL
          value: amqp://admin:password123@rabbitmq-service/my_vhost
        - name: RMQ_QUEUE_PUBLISH
          value: index_api.screening
        - name: RMQ_QUEUE_PUBLISH_EMAILAPI
          value: email_api.success
        - name: RMQ_QUEUE_CONSUME
          value: admin_api.order_received
        image: rasmuskibshede/adminapi:latest
        name: adminapi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi

##### FILE: admin-api_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/admin-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: admin-api
  name: admin-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: admin-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        service: admin-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USERNAME
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: app-db
        image: isjustintime/cd12355-admin-api:0.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health_check
            port: 5151
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: admin-api
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness_check
            port: 5151
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: admin-clusterrole-aggregation.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/karmada-view:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  annotations:
    rbac.authorization.kubernetes.io/autoupdate: "true"
  labels:
    kubernetes.io/bootstrapping: rbac-defaults
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-view: "true"
  name: karmada-view
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - autoscaling.karmada.io
  resources:
  - cronfederatedhpas
  - cronfederatedhpas/status
  - federatedhpas
  - federatedhpas/status
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - multicluster.x-k8s.io
  resources:
  - serviceexports
  - serviceexports/status
  - serviceimports
  - serviceimports/status
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - networking.karmada.io
  resources:
  - multiclusteringresses
  - multiclusteringresses/status
  - multiclusterservices
  - multiclusterservices/status
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - policy.karmada.io
  resources:
  - overridepolicies
  - propagationpolicies
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - work.karmada.io
  resources:
  - resourcebindings
  - resourcebindings/status
  - works
  - works/status
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch

---

##### FILE: admin-clusterrole-aggregation_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/karmada-edit:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  annotations:
    rbac.authorization.kubernetes.io/autoupdate: "true"
  labels:
    kubernetes.io/bootstrapping: rbac-defaults
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-edit: "true"
  name: karmada-edit
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - autoscaling.karmada.io
  resources:
  - cronfederatedhpas
  - cronfederatedhpas/status
  - federatedhpas
  - federatedhpas/status
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - deletecollection
  - patch
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - multicluster.x-k8s.io
  resources:
  - serviceexports
  - serviceexports/status
  - serviceimports
  - serviceimports/status
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - deletecollection
  - patch
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - networking.karmada.io
  resources:
  - multiclusteringresses
  - multiclusteringresses/status
  - multiclusterservices
  - multiclusterservices/status
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - deletecollection
  - patch
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - policy.karmada.io
  resources:
  - overridepolicies
  - propagationpolicies
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - deletecollection
  - patch
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - work.karmada.io
  resources:
  - resourcebindings
  - resourcebindings/status
  - works
  - works/status
  verbs:
  - create

##### FILE: admin-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/admin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: admin
  name: admin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: admin
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: admin
        environment: production
        tier: geoserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: geoservercloud/geoserver-cloud-admin-server:1.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: admin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1001
        runAsGroup: 1001
        runAsUser: 1001

---

##### FILE: adminer10_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/pgweb-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: lets-encrypt
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: public
  labels:
    name: pgweb-ingress
  name: pgweb-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: pgadmin.demo.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: pgweb-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - pgadmin.demo.com
    secretName: pgweb-tls

---

##### FILE: adminer3_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/adminer-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: adminer-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: adminer-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: adminer-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - php
        - -S
        - 0.0.0.0:8080
        - -t
        - /var/www/html
        env:
        - name: ADMINER_DESIGN
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ADMINER_DESIGN
              name: adminer-config
        - name: ADMINER_DEFAULT_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ADMINER_DEFAULT_SERVER
              name: adminer-secret
        image: adminer:4.7-standalone
        name: web

---

##### FILE: admin-ingress9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/dashboard-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTPS
  name: dashboard-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: k8s.gcp.bluemint.ai
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kubernetes-dashboard
            port:
              number: 443
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - k8s.gcp.bluemint.ai
    secretName: k8s-letsencrypt

---

##### FILE: admin-k8s.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/micro-demo-admin-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: micro-demo-admin-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: micro-demo-admin-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: micro-demo-admin-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NATS_URL
          value: http://nats-srv:4222
        - name: NATS_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: NATS_CLUSTER_ID
          value: micro-demo
        - name: PORTS
          value: "6000"
        - name: DB_URL
          value: mongodb://micro-demo-mongo-service
        - name: ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ADMIN_JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET
              name: micro-demo-secret
        - name: REFRESH_TOKEN_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ADMIN_JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN_SECRET
              name: micro-demo-secret
        image: micro-demo-admin
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: micro-demo-admin-deployment
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---

##### FILE: admin-pod1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/rethinkdb-admin:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    db: rethinkdb
    role: admin
  name: rethinkdb-admin
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: POD_NAMESPACE
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.namespace
    image: registry.k8s.io/rethinkdb:1.16.0_1
    name: rethinkdb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      name: admin-port
    - containerPort: 28015
      name: driver-port
    - containerPort: 29015
      name: cluster-port
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/rethinkdb_data
      name: rethinkdb-storage
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: rethinkdb-storage

---

  namespace: default

      app: selmag-admin-server

        - --spring.config.import=/etc/opt/admin-server/application-k8s.yml
        env:

          value: k8s
        - name: LOKI
          value: http://loki-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:3100

          name: service-config

        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: victoriametrics/vmagent:v1.93.12

          name: vmconfig
      volumes:

          name: admin-vmagent-cm
        name: vmconfig
      - configMap:
          name: admin-server-config
        name: service-config

##### FILE: admin-svc1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to service/Deployment/admin-svc-pods:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: admin-svc-pods
  namespace: service
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: admin-svc
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: admin-svc
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - admin
        env:
        - name: database.type
          value: ALL
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres.user
              name: secret-config
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres.password
              name: secret-config
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: service-config
        image: IMAGE_REGISTRY_PATH/services:REVISION_ID
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 180
        name: admin-svc-cont
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 2
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/oms
          name: log-data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - until pg_isready -h postgres.data; do echo waiting for postgres; sleep 2;
          done;
        image: postgres
        name: wait-for-postgres
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - until echo exit | cqlsh cassandra.data; do echo waiting for cassandra; sleep
          5; done;
        image: cassandra
        name: wait-for-cassandra
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log-data

---

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource service/Deployment/admin-svc-pods failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource service/Deployment/admin-svc-pods failed:

##### FILE: ad-service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ad-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ad-service
  name: ad-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ad-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ad-service
      name: ad-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: urban98/ad-service-api:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ads/api/health
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 120
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: ad-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ads/api/health
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 120
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200M
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux

---


Mutation:

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/ad-service failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: a-pod-service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to a/Pod/nginx-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-pod
  namespace: a
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:latest
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: html-volume
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - echo "this is a namespace nginx" > /mnt/index.html
    image: busybox
    name: init-nginx
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt
      name: html-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: html-volume

---

1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.
